i.name: Double Strike
i.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

q.name: Alpha Strike
q.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.

w.name: Meditate
w.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

e.name: Wuju Style
e.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.

r.name: Highlander
r.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.

riot.name: Double Strike
riot.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

i1.name: Double Strike
i1.blurb: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} With every fourth [[basic attack]] (within 4 seconds of each other), '''Master Yi''' strikes twice, the second strike dealing {{as|50% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{As|physical damage}}}}.
i1.description2: The second strike applies [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} dealing {{as|50% {{critical damage|50|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
i1.description3: If '''Master Yi's''' primary target is killed before the second strike, he automatically attacks another enemy within 300 range.
notes: * The fourth attack that triggers ''Double Strike'' will both reset the counter and add a stack for the next ''Double Strike'' activation.
** The next ''Double Strikes'' will happen at every third basic attack because of this (at every second with {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}).
* Depending on the timing of ''Double Strike'' with {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}, '''Master Yi''' will trigger:
** 1 additional [[on-hit]] effect each [[basic attack]].
** or 2 additional [[on-hit]] effects every second [[basic attack]].

riot.name: Alpha Strike
riot.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
riot.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to {{ e8 }} enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. During Alpha Strike Master Yi is untargetable.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by {{ e7 }} second.

Deals {{ e3 }} bonus damage to monsters.

q1.name: Alpha Strike
q1.blurb: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} and bounces to up to 4 {{tip|sight|visible}} enemies that are within 600 units away from each other, starting from the targeted enemy and prioritizing the closest ones.
q1.description2: He then {{tip|blink|blinks}} in front of his primary target and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies that he touched, increased against [[monster]]s.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|25 to 165}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}}|Monster Bonus Damage|{{ap|75 to 175}}|Monster Total Damage|{{ap|25+75 to 165+175}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}}}}
q1.description3: ''Alpha Strike'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}}, dealing {{as|60% {{critical damage|60|melee}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
q1.description4: Basic attacks reduce ''Alpha Strike's'' {{stil|cooldown}} by 1 second.
notes: * When '''Master Yi''' bounces from a unit it will grant {{tip|sight|vision}} around it. It will always grant vision around the primary target even if he doesn't bounce off it. This vision will not reveal [[brush|brushes]].
* ''Master Yi'' will reappear at ''Alpha Strike's'' cast location if his primary target dies or is too far away as he completes the blink.
* ''Master Yi'' will follow his primary target's movement even if it {{tip|vanish|vanishes}} or becomes {{tip|invisibility|invisible}}.
* ''Alpha Strike's'' cooldown reduction applies on structures but not when ''Master Yi'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Master Yi'' can use [[summoner spell]]s during ''Alpha Strike''.
* If the primary target is a champion, '''Master Yi''' will basic attack that champion when ''Alpha Strike'' finishes, but he cannot buffer ''{{ai|Highlander}}'' or ''{{ai|Wuju Style}}''.
* If the primary target is a minon or monster, '''Master Yi''' can buffer either ''{{ai|Highlander}}'' or ''{{ai|Wuju Style}}'', but he will not automatically basic attack the target.
* ''Alpha Strike'' counts as movement for the purposes of {{nie|Energized Strike}}, {{nie|Dreadnought}} and {{nie|Echo}}.

* ''Alpha Strike's'' damage is calculated individually on each bounce. It is possible to inflict differing amounts of damage during an ''Alpha Strike'' chain if '''Master Yi''' loses ''{{ais|Wuju Style}}'' passive {{as|bonus AD}} in the middle of ''Alpha Strike''.
** {{tip|Critical Strike|Critical strikes}} have the same chance each bounce. Because of this, hitting more targets increases ''Alpha Strike's'' overall critical strike chance.
* ''Alpha Strike'' applies damage after '''Master Yi''' leaves {{tip|untargetable|untargetability}} and thus can attract turret aggro.

riot.name: Meditate
riot.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
riot.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, reducing incoming damage by {{ e2 }}% and restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health over {{ f1.-1 }} seconds. This healing is increased by up to {{ e0 }}% based on Master Yi's missing health.

In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

Meditate's damage reduction is halved against structures.

w1.name: Meditate
w1.blurb: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi''' {{tip|channels}} for up to 4 seconds, {{tip|healing}} himself every {{fd|0.5}} seconds, increased by {{as|{{pp|11|type='''missing''' health|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|formula=1% per 1% missing health}}|health}}.
w1.leveling:
{{st|Minimum Healing Per Half Second|{{ap|15 to 55}} {{as|(+ {{fd|12.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Healing Per Half Second|{{ap|15*2 to 55*2}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Minimum Total Healing|{{ap|15*8 to 55*8}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Maximum Total Healing|{{ap|15*8*2 to 55*8*2}} {{as|(+ 200% AP)}}}}
w1.description2: While channeling, '''Master Yi''' reduces incoming damage, halved against [[turret]]s, pauses {{ais|Wuju Style|Master Yi}} and {{ais|Highlander|Master Yi}} duration, and grants one stack of {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}} per second.
notes: * ''Meditate's'' healing amount updates dynamically as he heals himself, making ''Master Yi'' heal for less as his current health increases.

riot.name: Wuju Style
riot.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

e1.name: Wuju Style
e1.blurb: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Master Yi''' gains {{as|10% AD}} as {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} while ''Wuju Style'' is not on [[cooldown]].
e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Master Yi's''' basic attacks deal {{tip|true damage|{{as|'''bonus''' true damage}}}} for 5 seconds.
notes: * ''Wuju Style'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Master Yi's'' previous orders.
* ''Wuju Style's'' bonus true damage does not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} nor does it affect structures.
* ''Wuju Style's'' bonus true damage cannot be {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}} but can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} and/or miss if ''Master Yi'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* ''Wuju Style's'' passive AD bonus is kept while ''Wuju Style'' is active.

riot.name: Highlander
riot.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by {{ rcooldownrefund*100 }}%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ rmsbonus }}%, Attack Speed by {{ rasbonus }}%, and grants immunity to slows for {{ rduration }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ rkillassistextension }} seconds.

r1.name: Highlander
r1.blurb: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
r1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} reduce the '''current''' {{sti|cooldown}} of '''Master Yi's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] by 70%.
r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} For 7 seconds, '''Master Yi''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, multiplies his {{sti|ms|{{as|'''total''' movement speed}}}} and becomes [[Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune]] to {{tip|slow|slows}} and {{tip|cripple|cripples}}.
r1.description3: While active, champion {{tip|takedown|takedowns}} extend the duration of ''Highlander'' by 7 seconds.
notes: * ''Highlander'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Master Yi's'' previous orders.

* ''Highlander's'' slow immunity extends to all slows including abilities with multiple effects (e.g {{tip|fear}}, {{tip|charm}}) and attack speed slows. The abilities themselves won't be negated, but the slows will.
* Without considering enemy respawns, {{ri|Presence of Mind}} can make ''Highlander's'' duration exceed its cooldown. For this ''Master Yi'' needs to:
** Kill 4 champions and have at least {{fd|31.4}}% cooldown reduction.
** Kill 5 champions and have at least {{fd|1.2}}% cooldown reduction.
* There're two situations that can happen if '''Master Yi''' uses ''Highlander'' while ''Highlander's'' buff is active.
** If the buff's duration is under 7 seconds, the buff refreshes to 7 seconds.
** If the buff's duration is above 7 seconds nothing happens.
